meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

presenters: David Pughes, City Marshal, City Marshal’s Office
Tameka Williams, Manager, City Marshal’s Office
Ghassan Khankarli, Ph.D., P.E., Director, Department of Transportation & Public Works
Jacob McCarroll, Program Administrator, Department of Transportation & Public Works
Don Spear, MBA, SHRM-SCP, Manager, Department of Transportation & Public Works
Carrie Rogers, Director, Office of Governmental Affairs
Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care
Holly Holt, Assistant Director, Office of Community Care

agenda_items.title: Approval of the June 10, 2024 Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
Update on the City’s School Crossing Guard Program
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the management and operations of the school crossing guard program.

agenda_items.title: Update on Transportation & Public Works Department (TPW) Commercial Driver License (CDL) Program
agenda_items.description: Overview of the CDL program and its impact on workforce development.

agenda_items.title: Workforce, Education and Equity Committee Proposed 2025 Legislative Priorities / Update
agenda_items.description: Discussion of legislative priorities for the upcoming session.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item from Office of Community Care for Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS (HOPWA) Program Second Renewal
agenda_items.description: Consideration of renewal contracts for HOPWA programs.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item from Office of Community Care to Accept Additional Grant Funds from Texas Department of Criminal Justice (TDJC) for FY25
agenda_items.description: Discussion on acceptance of additional grant funds for re-entry services.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item from Office of Procurement Services and Office of Community Care for the Purchase of Garden Box Kits
agenda_items.description: Consideration of a contract for garden box kits to address food insecurity.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item from Office of Community Care for an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County to Provide Housing Assistance for Persons with HIV/AIDS
agenda_items.description: Discussion on an interlocal agreement for housing assistance.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item from Office of Community to Accept a Grant from Texas Department of State Health Services for the Texas Lactation Support After-Hours Hotline
agenda_items.description: Consideration of grant acceptance for lactation support services.

agenda_items.title: Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items and discussions.

financial_items.description: HOPWA Program funding for Emergency/Tenant Based Rental Assistance
Grant funds from Texas Department of Criminal Justice for re-entry services
